title: Provided further that Projects, where LOI has been granted, shall be treated as per the DCR provisions existing on the date of LOI
clause_text: Provided further that Projects, where LOI has been granted, shall be treated as per the DCR provisions existing on the date of LOI. In case such a project comes up for revised LOI or change of developer or any other change, including recording and resubmission without change in slum boundary, prevailing DCR provisions shall apply. Provided further that for clubbing of schemes or amalgamation of schemes being sought and for schemes that have been sanctioned under different regulations (earlier as well as current one), FSI calculations shall apply as per the DCR regulations as on LOI dates of different schemes.
section: Conversion of Old Project into New Project:
